function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Global trade shrinking by 32%","Impact":"Economic instability, job loss, supply chain disruption, and reduced access to essential goods and services.","Mitigation":"Diversification of trade partners, investment in local production, and development of resilient supply chains.","Technologies":"Supply chain management systems, inventory tracking software, and data analytics for demand forecasting.","People":"Workers, businesses, and consumers.","Owner":"Government, businesses, and international trade organizations."},{"Description":"As many as 300 million people losing their jobs","Impact":"Increased financial insecurity, poverty, and limited access to healthcare and social services.","Mitigation":"Job creation programs, retraining initiatives, social safety nets, and financial support for affected individuals.","Technologies":"Labor market analytics, online training platforms, and digital job matching services.","People":"Unemployed individuals, low-income households, and marginalized communities.","Owner":"Government, non-profit organizations, and private sector employers."}]}
